column1: The default Magento LESS functionality is missing for the following website(s): %1. Try to run ssh command "php bin/magento setup:static-content:deploy". To add CSS please set "Include CSS" setting to "Yes".
column2: The default Magento LESS functionality is missing for the following website(s): %1. Try to run ssh command "php bin/magento setup:static-content:deploy". To add CSS please set "Include CSS" setting to "Yes".

column1: Set the width of the autocomplete popup window. Recommended value for horizontal view is 900. To get vertical view please enter 730 and lower.
column2: Set the width of the autocomplete popup window. Recommended value for horizontal view is 900. To get vertical view please enter 730 and lower.
